Articles.Content: My other love is Flight Simulator. There's this camera called EZdok where you can "play back" your launch videos but can switch your views from any angle you wish. You can see the launch from the VAB, or as far away as you wish. You can see the launch from the pilots viewpoint. Do you think someone will be able to incorporate this to KSP?

AT a guess, this is a system where it records the flight path of objects, so that they can be replayed, like the replay function in TF2. I like the idea, but I know nothing about plugins sot here is no way I could do it
It would be nice but your right
Looks like this is an add-on request, so I'll drop it in the appropriate subforum and see if it gets any interest
